name: Coda API
description: Access Coda documents, tables, and rows for collaborative data management and automation.

read: get_doc - Get specific document by ID
list_tables - List tables in a document
get_table - Get specific table by ID
list_rows - List rows in a table with optional filtering
get_row - Get specific row by ID
list_columns - List columns in a table
write: create_row - Create new row in a table
update_row - Update existing row by ID
